content.text: Match ends, Recreativo 2, Villarreal 0.
Second Half ends, Recreativo 2, Villarreal 0.
Goal!  Recreativo 2, Villarreal 0. Jonathan Valle (Recreativo) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Ángel Montoro following a fast break.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Jonathan Valle.
Attempt missed. Jonathan Valle (Recreativo) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right from a direct free kick.
